title: [K-12] Utilizing MUVEs for Science Inquiry: Problem-Based Learning Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Middle School-Level Science Knowledge (Ecosystems, Environmental Issues) and Basic Digital Device Usage Skills
context.additional_context: A customized science education program for adult learners, combining project-based learning to simultaneously enhance language skills and scientific thinking by exploring real-world environmental issues in MUVEs (Multi-User Virtual Environments).

learning_goals: Analyze and explain causes of ecosystem issues (eutrophication of lakes) through problem-based learning (PBL) in MUVEs environments
Conduct scientific inquiry processes (question formulation, hypothesis development, data collection, analysis, and conclusion drawing) using virtual reality-based simulations
Linguistically structure solutions for environmental issues and produce presentation materials through team-based projects
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
